author: @LuvLuke954
text: I think this is one of the real truths of why I finally realized my passion is in Data. I LOVE learning. And researching! Always looking for answers. Family thinks I should’ve been a lawyer  & my husband calls me his little forensic scientist. Lol.  In almost all fields - it is what it is. A daily grind of rote work - even if the clients are different. There is ALWAYS something new going on and something to learn for a better outcome and for future projects.  I love it. ❤

author: @ChahtaAnumpa
text: Been doing it for 20 years as of last October. Never learned anything more out of college. To each their own. I think people should learn more if they want but a great analyst is a great analyst from experience.

author: @DarkGT
text: That's the case for any tech job, new tools and job task could be introduced anytime in the future. But like in the programming if you have solid foundations in one programming lang, it's faster to learn a new one later on.

author: @holge2710
text: I unsubscribed because of way too many short videos. Don’t think people go to Youtube for short videos, they have tiktok for that.

author: @estiven8718
text: For this, it's important that you set a daily learning process, every day you'll learn something different, that's an habit I recommend.
